1.0.name: wordpress/wp-cookies-alert
1.0.description: According to the new EU e-Privacy Directive you have to get your visitors informed consent before placing a cookie on their machine. WP Cookies Alert allows to display an alert box on your WordPress blog notifying visitors you blog uses cookies. You can display a short message or publish a link to a page with extended explenation. WP Cookies Alert is multilingual and can be translated to multiple languages. English and spanish are included.
